sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-authorization', templateUrl: './authorization.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authorization.component.css'] }) export class AuthorizationComponent implements OnInit { public isRegirtrated : boolean = false; constructor() { } changeState(){ this.isRegirtrated = !this.isRegirtrated; } ngOnInit() { } }
